movie.title: Lo and Behold: Reveries of the Connected World
movie.title_english: Lo and Behold: Reveries of the Connected World
movie.title_long: Lo and Behold: Reveries of the Connected World (2016)
movie.description_intro: Werner Herzog's exploration of the Internet and the connected world.
movie.description_full: Werner Herzog's exploration of the Internet and the connected world.

movies.title: Kelet
movies.summary: Kelet is a young Somali trans woman who dreams of becoming a Vogue model. Leaving her family in Manchester to return to her childhood home in Finland, she draws on the support of her friends in the Vogue community to immerse herself in Helsinki's glamour. Watch this shy and courageous young woman build a new life for herself, face her fears and her past, and succeed in following her dreams.
movies.description_full: Kelet is a young Somali trans woman who dreams of becoming a Vogue model. Watch this shy and courageous young woman build a new life for herself, face her fears and her past, and succeed in following her dreams.

movies.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy
movies.title_english: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy
movies.title_long: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy (1955)
movies.summary: In Egypt Peter and Freddie find the archaeologist Dr. Zoomer murdered before they can return to America. A medallion leads them to a crypt where a revived mummy provides the terror.
movies.description_full: In Egypt Peter and Freddie find the archaeologist Dr. Zoomer murdered before they can return to America. A medallion leads them to a crypt where a revived mummy provides the terror.
movies.synopsis: In Egypt Peter and Freddie find the archaeologist Dr. Zoomer murdered before they can return to America. A medallion leads them to a crypt where a revived mummy provides the terror.

movies.title: September
movies.summary: Everyone is gathering at Lane's place for the weekend, and everyone's in love. Unfortunately, each beloved loves somebody else, and no one seems to realize it.
movies.description_full: Everyone is gathering at Lane's place for the weekend, and everyone's in love. Unfortunately, each beloved loves somebody else, and no one seems to realize it.
movies.synopsis: Everyone is gathering at Lane's place for the weekend, and everyone's in love. Unfortunately, each beloved loves somebody else, and no one seems to realize it.

movies.title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
movies.summary: A French woman and a Japanese man have an affair while she is in Japan making a film about peace and the impact of the atomic bomb on Hiroshima, The man, an architect, lost his family in the bombing. She recalls her lover during the war, a 23 year-old German soldier who later died. Despite the time they spend together, her attachment appears minimal and they go forward into the future.
